General.Name: Anhui Yingliu
General.Description: Anhui Yingliu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells high-end equipment core components in China, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers special equipment parts, such as pumps and valve parts, and mechanical equipment components that are used in aerospace, nuclear power, oil and gas, and other resource industries. Anhui Yingliu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Hefei, China.
